content.p: GEP - Globalisation and Economic Policy Centre - is a major research centre studying the impact of globalisation. GEP has an international reputation and the Centre's academics have advised national and international institutions including: The Malaysia branch runs regular events including an annual international conference, seminars, workshops and public lectures. For further information about GEP in Malaysia, please contact local co-ordinator Dr Teo Wing Leong WingLeong.Teo@nottingham.edu.my or GEP Centre Manager Sue Berry at sue.berry@nottingham.ac.uk For details of past and future GEP events in Malaysia please follow the links below. GEP holds regular conferences in Malaysia including international speakers. Annual lectures series take place at the Malaysia Campus attended by staff and students. Regular workshops are held Find out more about the Malaysia Workshop Series Read the latest news and media briefings from the Malaysia press centre telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8253 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
